content: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services! I can help you with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC services. To get started, could I have your name, please?
It’s Linda. I need help with an electrical issue ASAP.
Thank you, Linda! I’m sorry to hear you’re having an issue. Could you provide your address so I can confirm we can send a technician to your location?
Thanks, Linda. Could you please tell me your ideal time for the appointment? We’ll do our best to get someone to you as soon as possible.
This afternoon, as soon as possible. My lights keep flickering and it’s very annoying.
Thank you! Let me check our technician’s availability for this afternoon. One moment, please.
reason: System error while checking technician availability. Operator assistance required.
